about_the_game:
The Lichenvale original soundtrack, composed by Branislav Gagic, takes you on a journey through dark fantasy worlds of nightmares - through twisted forests, ancient dungeons, haunted graveyards, snowy ravines, and more.

The soundtrack contains 11 tracks, including one track not used in the game. All proceeds from the soundtrack go to the composer.

All tracks are available in both 320kbps MP3 and lossless WAV format.

TOTAL RUN TIME: 63 minutes.
